name: Clouds Below
description:
Clouds Below is a 3d person adventure platformer. You explore the mountains above the clouds and solve wind based puzzles.

This is a prototype made in 7 weeks, in Unreal Engine 4.

We now have keyboard & mouse support! (Gamepad still recommended)

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Movement (R)

Space - Jump (X)

LMB - Gust Away (R2)

RMB - Gust Towards (L2)

MMB - Center Camera (L3/Dpad-down)

Left Shift - Soar (L1)

F - Burst (O)

If you like it. Please tell us why! Either here or our facebook/twitter

Clouds Below - FacebookClouds Below - Twitter

You may also email us at contact@cloudsbelowgame.com
